description: A kingdom located on Momoiro Island where 'those with a heart of a maiden' gather. The kingdom is ruled by Emporio Ivankov and is home to the practice of New Kama Kenpo martial arts and the creation of Attack Cuisine. The name means 'nothing but transvestites' in Japanese.

keyMoments.title: Attack Cuisine Revealed
keyMoments.description: The unique culinary tradition of the Kamabakka Kingdom is explained to Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a special cultural practice of the kingdom that combines cooking with power enhancement.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Begins Training with the Kingdom
keyMoments.description: Sanji starts his challenge to defeat the 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo.
keyMoments.significance: The kingdom becomes Sanji's training ground for two years.
